name: Don't fall (itch) (marcos_ventura)
description:
This beta version contains :

- Intro screen with a short story.

- Main Menu screen

- Tutorial Screen

- Gameplay :

  - Third Person playable character that walks and jumps.

  - 2 enemy Ai's (slime and flying monitor)

  - Pickups (hearts, nuts and a force field shield)

  - HUD with a timer,  lives (hearts) and coins (nuts)

 - End of game screens: Game Over and You Win (with grading from 1 to 3 stars)

All Design and Development by Marcos Ventura using Unreal Engine 4, Blender 3 and Adobe Photoshop.
